CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 23, 1958, pg. 2, reads: "Charged With Brutality - Patrolman Robert S. Faucett Jr. (left) and Raymond Hovan (right center) were charged, respectively, with aggravated assault and battery, and assault and battery by John Minter Jr., of West Mifflin, and his girl friend, Miss June Moore (center), through their attorney, Livingstone M. Johnson (right) at a hearing Tuesday night before Alderman Harry B. Fitzgerald of Pittsburgh's Fifth Ward."
TitMainTitle: Whitaker police officers Robert S. Faucett and Raymond Hovan charged with brutality, gathered before Alderman Harry B. Fitzgerald for hearing, with Attorneys Livingstone M. Johnson and Oliver L. Johnson, another version
